statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); parent=$(basename "$(dirname "$cwd")"); current=$(basename "$cwd"); dir="$parent/$current"; cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then color="\033[32m"; else color="\033[33m"; fi; printf "ðŸ“‚ %s  ðŸŒ¿ ${color}%s\033[0m  \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$dir" "$branch" "$model"; else printf "ðŸ“‚ %s  \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$dir" "$model"; fi
